channel.title: Analytics and Reporting on News
channel.description: Recent content in Analytics and Reporting on News

item.title: The Importance of Analytics for a Healthcare System
item.description: Ever increasing computational power, advances in artificial intelligence, and the lower of the cost computation (because of cloud computing service such as Azure and Amazon Web Services) has enabled healthcare systems – often laggards in quality improvement and technology adoption – to rapidly implement analytics systems. Such systems enable enterprises to analyze and model their processes, engage in meaningful quality and process improvement activities, and prepare to succeed in value and risk-based payment models.
